tool_description: Extracts and preprocesses text content from resume documents, handling OCR for scanned documents and cleaning extracted text.

document_content.description: Raw document content or file path

ocr_enabled.description: Enable OCR processing for scanned documents

language.description: Primary language of the document (en, es, fr, de, etc.)

extract_tables.description: Attempt to preserve table structure in text

error_messages: Invalid document content: Ensure document_content is not empty and contains valid text or file path.
OCR processing failed: The document quality may be too poor for text recognition. Try with a higher quality scan.
Unsupported language: Use a supported language code (en, es, fr, de, it, pt, nl, pl, ru, zh, ja, ko).
Text extraction timeout: The document is too large or complex. Try splitting into smaller sections.
usage: Pass the document_content and configure OCR and language settings as needed. Enable clean_text for standardized output and extract_tables if the resume contains tabular data.

extracted_text.description: Clean, extracted text content from the document

confidence_score.description: OCR confidence score (0-1) if OCR was used

detected_language.description: Auto-detected primary language of the text

word_count.description: Total word count in extracted text
